content_by_page.1: parent:div:[text:Safekeeper Forensic Evidence Drying Cabinets provide cost-effective storage and containment for forensic evidence as it is dried by a constant flow of air. content_by_page.0: parent:div:[parent:div:[text:Description,text:With a HEPA main filter formulated to contain any particulates or biological material that might be present on swabs, SafeSWABÂ® is used to safely dry evidence swabs while protecting them from cross-contamination.]]
content_by_page.1: parent:div:[parent:div:[text:Description,text:The Evidence Transporter is a special-purpose basic evidence transporter and storage cabinet designed to maintain the chain of custody in transport from the field to the laboratory, while allowing effective air-drying prior to evidence processing.]]
content_by_page.2: parent:div:[parent:div:[text:Customized Cabinet and Containment Enclosures,text:We build custom enclosures for specific customer requirements and applications. content_by_page.2: parent:ul:[text:Air Science has developed enclosures to accommodate many of the most commonly used robotic systems.,text:Custom enclosures can be designed to protect the process, operator, or both from particulates, fumes and vapors.,text:Customization can range from small modifications of existing standard Air Science models, to completely custom, application-specific enclosures.]
